communications.subject: Oklahoma Open Records Act Request: Incident Report
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Oklahoma Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

A police report filed by John Smith, who was working for Falls Creek and interviewed Kailey Jane Childers on July 3rd, 2007. Smith filed the report as a deputy of Murray County Sheriff's Department in Murray County, Oklahoma.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

April Peveto Goldman

title: Open Records Request: Community Public Safety Grant

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request: Community Public Safety Grant
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

According to a press release from Gov. Kemp's office on June 8, 2023, the Governor's office awarded more than $83.5 million in grants for 118 qualified projects as part of the Community Public Safety Grant program.

This included a grant of $832,960.70 awarded to Forsyth County described in additional documents provided by the Governor.

source: https://gov.georgia.gov/press-releases/2023-06-08/gov-kemp-announces-835m-community-public-safety-grant-awards

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

A copy of all documents, including but not limited to, applications, agreements, and reporting documents from the "Community Public Safety Grant" program for the grant of $832,960.70 awarded to Forsyth County as described in the Governor's press release and additional documents.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

e

title: Request for Correctional Mental Health Staff Directory and Contact Information (Department of Correctional Services)

communications.subject: Nebraska Public Records Act Request: Request for Correctional Mental Health Staff Directory and Contact Information (Department of Correctional Services)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nebraska Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting a list of currently employed mental health professionals within your state's Department of Corrections or its subsidiary agencies, as well as their contact information.

Specifically, I am requesting:

- Full names
- Job titles
- Assigned correctional facility
- Government-issued email addresses
- Government-issued phone numbers (direct desk numbers if available, otherwise department phone numbers with or without extensions)
- Department/division (e.g. Behavioral Health, Mental Health Services)

This request applies to the following roles: rehabilitative program coordinators, licensed psychologists, psychiatrists, clinical social workers, and other licensed mental health professionals serving incarcerated populations in state-operated facilities.

If available, I request this information be provided in a machine-readable format such as CSV or Excel.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 4 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Ma

communications.subject: RE: Nebraska Public Records Act Request: Request for Correctional Mental Health Staff Directory and Contact Information (Department of Correctional Services)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

I wanted to follow up on the following Nebraska Public Records Act request, copied below, and originally submitted on May 15, 2025. Please let me know when I can expect to receive a response.

Thanks for your help, and let me know if further clarification is needed.

communications.subject: RE: Nebraska Public Records Act Request: Request for Correctional Mental Health Staff Directory and Contact Information (Department of Correctional Services)
communications.communication:
Good afternoon,

Our records indicate that this request was received on May 15, 2025.  As outlined in Nebraska statute, you can expect to receive a response within four business days, which calculates to May 21, 2025.  Therefore, you can expect to receive a response by the end of the day tomorrow.
Sincerely,
Kathleen Kokensparger
Public Records Manager | CENTRAL OFFICE

Nebraska Department of Correctional Services
OFFICE   402-479-5767
FAX       402-479-5623
kathleen.kokensparger@nebraska.gov<https://mail.nebraska.gov/owa/redir.aspx?C=V4pR88jIRUVzu0a_BEeYhUyMGoCTp3IRG0H1EFpsaE6smBMvij7WCA..&URL=mailto%3akathleen.kokensparger%40nebraska.gov>
corrections.nebraska.gov<https://mail.nebraska.gov/owa/redir.aspx?C=3tXpjzPHdUgAAM5iZyaZ3A-T_EDw-34iGlngmLlnenGsmBMvij7WCA..&URL=http%3a%2f%2fwww.corrections.nebraska.gov%2f> |Facebook<https://mail.nebraska.gov/owa/redir.aspx?C=hn51PO6-_gxC6CQ3djTJOQtClorILZHLDNrGqpqA6yqsmBMvij7WCA..&URL=https%3a%2f%2fwww.facebook.com%2fNECorrections> | Twitter<https://mail.nebraska.gov/owa/redir.aspx?C=_qR2HZ-wRPgar_KdQgXT6ZkSlPKcTwIulVjNFAxYVmKsmBMvij7WCA..&URL=https%3a%2f%2ftwitter.com%2fNECorrections>

title: Request for Correctional Mental Health Staff Directory and Contact Information (Department of Corrections)

communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Request for Correctional Mental Health Staff Directory and Contact Information (Department of Corrections)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting a list of currently employed mental health professionals within your state's Department of Corrections or its subsidiary agencies, as well as their contact information.

Specifically, I am requesting:

- Full names
- Job titles
- Assigned correctional facility
- Government-issued email addresses
- Government-issued phone numbers (direct desk numbers if available, otherwise department phone numbers with or without extensions)

This request applies to the following roles: rehabilitative program coordinators, licensed psychologists, psychiatrists, clinical social workers, and other licensed mental health professionals serving incarcerated populations in state-operated facilities.

If available, I request this information be provided in a machine-readable format such as CSV or Excel.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Ma

communications.subject: Welcome to the Open Records Center!
communications.communication:
Dear Andrew  Ma, 
Thank you for registering with the Records Center.  Please log in to the Records Center to update any contact or password information and to track the progress of your request. 
 
 Login: 186615-04169659@requests.muckrock.com 
If you did not submit your request through the public portal but are receiving this e-mail, an account has been created for you where you can track and monitor the status of your request, and receive any documents in response to your request.

communications.subject: General Inmate Records :: G021041-051525
communications.communication:
Dear Andrew Ma: 
Thank you for your interest in public records of Georgia Department of Corrections. Your request has been received and is being processed in accordance with the Open Records Act, O.C.G.A. 50-18-70, et seq. Your request was received in this office on 5/15/2025 and given the reference number G021041-051525 for tracking purposes. Records Requested: To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting a list of currently employed mental health professionals within your state's Department of Corrections or its subsidiary agencies, as well as their contact information.

Specifically, I am requesting:

- Full names
- Job titles
- Assigned correctional facility
- Government-issued email addresses
- Government-issued phone numbers (direct desk numbers if available, otherwise department phone numbers with or without extensions)
- Department/division (e.g. Behavioral Health, Mental Health Services)

This request applies to the following roles: rehabilitative program coordinators, licensed psychologists, psychiatrists, clinical social workers, and other licensed mental health professionals serving incarcerated populations in state-operated facilities.

If available, I request this information be provided in a machine-readable format such as CSV or Excel.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Andrew Ma

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fdepartment-corrections-3973%252Frequest-for-correctional-mental-health-staff-directory-and-contact-information-department-of-corrections-186615%252F%253Femail%253Dopen.records%252540gdc.ga.gov&url_auth_token=AAANHax4879lPQcY-GyswBxh6Uc%3A1uFkmq%3AooyQPtk_T2tKm5zwBc23lHX1Uat4efnm_4bdCH7Km-0 
Your request will be forwarded to the relevant department(s) to locate the information you seek and to determine the volume and any costs associated with satisfying your request. You will be contacted about the availability and/or provided with copies of the records in question. 
PLEASE NOTE: The Open Records Act does not require a governmental body to prepare new reports, summaries, or compilations not in existence at the time of the request, or to answer questions. 
Sincerely, 
Georgia Department of Corrections 
You can monitor the progress of your request in " My Records Center"

communications.subject: General Inmate Records :: G021041-051525
communications.communication:
--- Please respond above this line --- 

 
 
RE: PUBLIC RECORDS REQUEST of May 15, 2025., Reference # G021041-051525. 
Dear Andrew Ma, 
The Georgia Department of Corrections received a request for public records from you on May 15, 2025. Your request mentioned: “To Whom It May Concern: 

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records: 

I am requesting a list of currently employed mental health professionals within your state's Department of Corrections or its subsidiary agencies, as well as their contact information. 

Specifically, I am requesting: 

- Full names 
- Job titles 
- Assigned correctional facility 
- Government-issued email addresses 
- Government-issued phone numbers (direct desk numbers if available, otherwise department phone numbers with or without extensions) 
- Department/division (e.g. Behavioral Health, Mental Health Services) 

This request applies to the following roles: rehabilitative program coordinators, licensed psychologists, psychiatrists, clinical social workers, and other licensed mental health professionals serving incarcerated populations in state-operated facilities. 

If available, I request this information be provided in a machine-readable format such as CSV or Excel. 

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. 

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not. 

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires. 

Sincerely, 

Andrew Ma 

Upload documents directly: https://accounts.muckrock.com/accounts/login/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.muckrock.com%2Faccounts%2Flogin%2F%3Fnext%3D%252Faccounts%252Fagency_login%252Fdepartment-corrections-3973%252Frequest-for-correctional-mental-health-staff-directory-and-contact-information-department-of-corrections-186615%252F%253Femail%253Dopen.records%252540gdc.ga.gov&url_auth_token=AAANHax4879lPQcY-GyswBxh6Uc%3A1uFkmq%3AooyQPtk_T2tKm5zwBc23lHX1Uat4efnm_4bdCH7Km-0” 
This request appears to be for staff at each facility. The GDC contracts with an outside entity to provide medical services for inmates in facilities and those individuals are not employees of the GDC, and GDC does not have responsive documents. 
Please feel free to contact me via the GDC's open records portal or by phone at (478) 550-6350, if you need any further assistance. 
Sincerely, 
Timothy Duff 
Assistant General Counsel 
Legal Services 
To monitor the progress or update this request please log into the Open Records Center (https://u8387778.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.VEsWrlMiJDg0mXafq1mEXepXMZ14ulCf9LQprjaGBmx9dr04uiv4hl1U2hgxKSWRj5xVHRRGlao-2FfiA2YzG1k1z7pFOpl-2F0u46DvIFSS7RctNSfdzq1Og3IB4er38VnbxpEF_IkqGf3OYDNpKuC66-2F9jJjeAuWeBY8UKTOySNIkfJzLRFDMgOGvk9ongkjRrPY8A8j0BojabAo-2BZweltktfid-2FVT2TE1Rb2AUUO-2FaDDzx4l-2BFowM9LK1DtUComKMNEgcwKTto9XHSZiZ5-2BI6utmrXv8TfQuz9EQTUi-2Fzm569AYgPx2JHbE5JgdEaC6hlUvuq6lMvLfuBWxiq6I7Z2f2DD7Tj0wg4EtCwcWAzAv0JwKorDx-2Ff9ut-2FCXK6Kr-2FHZ5juWCXcXJBv2scQdBZVsou3RdL-2Fi-2Br0ipy5pY8Nl-2F7odX4QH6zfHCts1-2BC4qFj7xUsvg5Edmtg9idZf3G29ADac4TVmpCNJEVoqUPpk4CBRyJHY-2FIntxakwmXvKzyfRjBbgg)
